resources.string:
App starts scanning devices automatically if previous connection does not exist.
 Scan can be started manually by choosing "Scan Devices" from the top right overflow menu.
 Choose a device to connect to.

 To open the lamp control panel, click on a lamp (green) or a group (red).
 To view lamp data, press the info button on top right corner of the panel.

 Press and hold on a list item to start selecting lamps or to expand/collapse a group.
 Click on "Create group" to create new group from selected lamps.
 Click on "Remove" to remove selected lamps from group.
 Click on a group to add selected lamps to it.
 Note: Lamps from group "All lamps" cannot be removed.
